skills.Name: From Fire
skills.Description: Deals medium single target damage (3 hits) using weapon's element. Heals self by 20% if the target is Burned.

skills.Name: Lumiere Assault
skills.Description: Deals low single target damage (5 hits) using weapon's element. Critical hits generate 1 Additional Charge.

skills.Name: Marking Shot
skills.Description: Deals low single target Lightning damage (1 hit). Applies Mark to the target.

skills.Name: Overcharge
skills.Description: Deals high Lightning damage based on the number of Charges (1 hit). Can Break enemies.

skills.Name: Powerful
skills.Description: Applies Powerful to 1–3 allies, increasing their damage for 3 turns. Grants 0–2 Charges.

skills.Name: Recovery
skills.Description: Recovers 50% Health and dispels Status Effects. Grants 0–2 Charges.

skills.Name: Shatter
skills.Description: Deals high Lightning damage to all enemies (1 hit). Can Break. If a target is Broken by this hit, Overcharge becomes fully Charged.

skills.Name: Strike Storm
skills.Description: Deals very high single target damage (6 hits) using weapon's element. Critical hits generate 2 Additional Charges.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: 50% increased damage on Rank D. No damage increase on other ranks.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: On Rank D, recover 20% Health with Base Attack.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Perfection is now based on current Health. Gain 1 Rank every 20% missing Health.
Start battle at Rank S, but can't be Healed or gain Shields.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: 20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Light damage can Burn on Critical hits.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Increase Burn damage by 50% per Rank, up to 300% on Rank S.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Switch to Rank S on Break. Base Attack can Break.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Triggers a lightning strike on Critical hits.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Base Attack applies 2 Burn stack per Rank.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Increase Burn damage by 50% per Rank, up to 300% on Rank S.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Don't lose Rank when taking damage from Powerless enemies.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: +1 Perfection on hitting a Powerless enemy.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: No Perfection loss on damage taken. Perfection is instead lost on being Healed.
Base attack gives 1 Perfection per Burn on target.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: While Powerful, 20% chance to Burn on hit.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Start battle on Rank B, but 50% Health.
Casting a Light Skill increases damage of next Physical Skill cast by 50% and vice versa.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Dealing Light damage with a Skill recovers 3% Health.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Gain 1 Rank on Counterattack
Play again after a Base Attack.
When hit, lose 1 Perfection instead of 1 rank.
Convert Light damage Skills to Physical damage.
+1 Perfection on Critical hit.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: Self-Heal by 2% Health on dealing a Critical hit.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Counterattack is always a Critical hit.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Rank can't be lower than C.
Base Attack consumes all Shields to deal 100% increased damage per Shield.
N/A
Double Perfection gained on Free Aim shots.
Can't lose Perfection. No damage increase from Rank.
-1 to all Perfection gain but can't reach Rank S.
An ethereal Sword deals Light damage on any damage dealt with Skills.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: 20% chance to apply Burn on dealing Light damage.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Can't die if at least Rank A.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Bonus damage from Perfection applies to all allies at half value. Bonus damage no longer applies to Verso.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: Perfection gained is increased by 1 while Powerful

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Gain 1 Rank on applying Mark.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: Mark an enemy on Base Attack.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Apply Powerless on Marking an enemy.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: N/A

skills.Name: Crippling Tsunami
skills.Description: Deals medium Ice damage to all enemies (1 hit). Applies Slow for 3 turns. Consumes Earth, Lightning, and Fire Stains for greatly increased damage.

skills.Name: Crustal Crush
skills.Description: Deals high single-target Earth and Break damage (5 hits). Consumes Lightning Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Earth Rising
skills.Description: Deals low Earth damage to all enemies (1 hit). Consumes Lightning Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Electrify
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Lightning damage (3 hits). Critical Hits trigger an additional hit. Consumes Fire Stain to generate one Light Stain.

skills.Name: Elemental Genesis
skills.Description: Deals extreme damage to all enemies (8 hits). Each hit deals damage in a random element. Can only be cast with Lightning, Earth, Fire, and Ice Stains.

skills.Name: Elemental Trick
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Ice, Fire, Lightning, and Earth damage (4 hits). Critical Hits generate the corresponding Stain.

skills.Name: Fire Rage
skills.Description: Deals increasingly high Fire damage to all enemies every turn until Lune receives damage. Stuns self if interrupted. Consumes Ice Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Healing Light
skills.Description: Heals the targeted ally and dispels Status Effects. Consumes Earth Stain: costs 0 AP.

skills.Name: Hell
skills.Description: Deals very high Fire damage that applies 5 Burn per hit to all enemies (2 hits). Deals self-damage if failed. Consumes Ice, Earth, and Lightning Stains for greatly increased damage.

skills.Name: Ice Lance
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Ice damage that Slows the target (1 hit). Consumes Earth Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Immolation
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Fire damage and applies 3 Burn (1 hit). Applies 2 more Burns if the target is Marked. Consumes Ice Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Lightning Dance
skills.Description: Deals very high single-target Lightning damage (6 hits). Critical Hits trigger an additional hit. Consumes Earth, Ice, and Fire Stains for greatly increased damage.

skills.Name: Mayhem
skills.Description: Consumes all Stains to deal high elemental damage to the target. Can Break if 4 Stains are consumed.

skills.Name: Rebirth
skills.Description: Revives an ally with 30–70% Health and 2 additional AP. Consumes Lightning Stains: costs 0 AP.

skills.Name: Revitalization
skills.Description: Heals 1–3 allies by 40–60% Health. Consumes Fire Stains to also apply Regen that heals on turn start for 3 turns.

skills.Name: Rockslide
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Earth damage (2 hits). Can Break. Consumes Lightning, Ice, and Fire Stains for greatly increased damage.

skills.Name: Sky Break
skills.Description: Deals extreme damage to all enemies (1 hit). Element depends on which Stains Lune has the most. Can Break.

skills.Name: Storm Caller
skills.Description: All enemies receive medium Lightning damage at the end of their turn and low Lightning damage when they receive damage. Duration: 3 turns. Consumes Fire Stains for double thunder strikes on turn end.

skills.Name: Terraquake
skills.Description: Deals low Earth and Break damage to all enemies every turn. Also increases Break damage received by 50%. Duration: 3 turns. Consumes Lightning Stains to increase duration to 5 turns.

skills.Name: Thermal Transfer
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Ice damage (2 hits). Gains 4 AP if the target is Burning. Consumes Earth Stains to play a second turn.

skills.Name: Thunderfall
skills.Description: Deals medium Lightning damage to random enemies (2–6 hits). Critical Hits trigger an additional hit. Consumes Fire Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Tree of Life
skills.Description: Cleanses all Status Effects and Heals all allies.

skills.Name: Tremor
skills.Description: Deals high Earth damage to all enemies (1 hit). Removes all enemies' Shields.

skills.Name: Typhoon
skills.Description: On turn start, deals high Ice damage to all enemies and Heals allies. Consumes Earth Stains to increase duration from 3 to 5 turns.

weapons.Name: Angerim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Base Attack applies 2 Burn per Fire Stain.
Lvl. 10: Generate one Fire Stain at the beginning of each turn.
Lvl. 20: 30% increased Burn damage per Fire Stain.

weapons.Name: Benisim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Healing Skills cost 1 less AP.
Lvl. 10: Generate one Earth Stain at the beginning of each turn.
Lvl. 20: Replay instantly on consuming Stains with a Healing Skill.

weapons.Name: Betelim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Using a Skill that consumes Stains increases damage by 20%. Can stack up to 5 times. Resets on using a Skill without consuming Stains.
Lvl. 10: On turn start, if no Stains, 2 random Stains are generated.
Lvl. 20: +1 AP when Stains are consumed.

weapons.Name: Braselim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: 30% increased Critical Chance per Ice Stain.
Lvl. 10: +5% of a Gradient Charge on Critical hit.
Lvl. 20: 20% increased Fire damage with Skills.

weapons.Name: Chapelim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: 30% increased Break damage per Earth Stain.
Lvl. 10: Gain 9 AP on Breaking an enemy.
Lvl. 20: Generate one Earth Stain at the beginning of each turn.

weapons.Name: Choralim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: 100% Critical Chance when 4 Stains are simultaneously active.
Lvl. 10: 20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.
Lvl. 20: Critical hits apply Burn.

weapons.Name: Colim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: 50% chance to generate a Light Stain when consuming Stains.
Lvl. 10: +1 AP on consuming a Light Stain.
Lvl. 20: 20% increased damage with Skills per active Light Stain.

weapons.Name: Coralim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Ice Skills cost 1 less AP.
Lvl. 10: 20% increased Ice damage with Skills.
Lvl. 20: Start battle with 1 Earth Stain.

weapons.Name: Deminerim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Lightning Skills cost 1 less AP.
Lvl. 10: 20% increased Lightning damage with Skills.
Lvl. 20: Start battle with 1 Fire Stain.

weapons.Name: Elerim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Consuming an Earth Stain applies 1 Shield to self.
Lvl. 10: 20% increased Earth damage with Skills.
Lvl. 20: Base Attack generates an Earth Stain.

weapons.Name: Kralim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Casting a Skill increases the Skill damage of all other elements by 20%. Resets when casting a Skill of a previous element.
Lvl. 10: On turn start, if no Stains, 2 random Stains are generated.
Lvl. 20: +1 AP when Stains are consumed.

weapons.Name: Lighterim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Fire Skills cost 1 less AP.
Lvl. 10: 20% increased Fire damage with Skills.
Lvl. 20: Start battle with 1 Ice Stain.

weapons.Name: Lithelim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: 5% chance to generate a Dark Stain when consuming Stains. Deal 50% more damage with Skills per active Dark Stain.
Lvl. 10: +1 AP on consuming a Light Stain.
Lvl. 20: Base Attacks can consume one Dark Stain to deal 200% more damage.

weapons.Name: Lunerim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: N/A
Lvl. 10: N/A
Lvl. 20: N/A

weapons.Name: Painerim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Earth Skills cost 1 less AP.
Lvl. 10: 20% increased Earth damage with Skills.
Lvl. 20: Start battle with 1 Lightning Stain.

weapons.Name: Potierim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Healing Skills generate one additional 1 Light stain.
Lvl. 10: Consuming a Light Stain applies Slow to a random enemy.
Lvl. 20: Base Attack generates a Light Stain.

weapons.Name: Redalim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Healing Skills generate one additional Light stain.
Lvl. 10: Generate one Ice Stain at the beginning of each turn.
Lvl. 20: Replay instantly on consuming Stains with a Healing Skill.

weapons.Name: Saperim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Using a Gradient Attack generates 1 additional Light Stain.
Lvl. 10: When a Fire Stain is generated, a Lightning Stain is also generated. Once per turn.
Lvl. 20: Gradient Attacks and Gradient Counters deal 50% more damage.

weapons.Name: Scaverim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: 50% chance to generate a Dark Stain when consuming Stains. Deal 50% more damage with Skills per active Dark Stain.
Lvl. 10: Base Attacks can consume one Dark Stain to deal 200% more damage.
Lvl. 20: With 4 active Dark Stains, any Skill can consume them to deal 300% more damage.

weapons.Name: Snowim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Freeze self when falling below 30% health. Prevent the next instance of damage while Frozen.
Lvl. 10: On turn start, if Frozen, remove Freeze and recover 60% Health.
Lvl. 20: Gain 2 Ice Stains and 3 AP when Frozen.

weapons.Name: Trebuchim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Generate a random Stain on Free Aim shot.
Lvl. 10: +1 AP when Stains are consumed.
Lvl. 20: Base Attack generates 2 random Stains.

weapons.Name: Troubadim
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Free Aim Shots deal damage to an additional random target.
Lvl. 10: 50% increased Free Aim damage.
Lvl. 20: Generate a random Stain on Free Aim shot.

skills.Name: Breaking Rules
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Physical damage (2 hits). Destroys all target's Shields and gains 1 AP per Shield destroyed. If the target is Defenseless, play a second turn.

skills.Name: Burning Canvas
skills.Description: Changes stance to Offensive. Deals high single-target Void damage (5 hits). Applies 1 Burn per hit. Damage increases for each Burn on the target.

skills.Name: Combustion
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Physical damage (2 hits). Consumes up to 10 Burn stacks for increased damage.

skills.Name: Degagement
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Fire damage (1 hit). Target becomes weak to Fire damage for 2 turns.

skills.Name: Egide
skills.Description: Protects allies by taking damage in their place for 2 turns. Duration is extended by 1 when gaining Shell.

skills.Name: Fencer's Flurry
skills.Description: Deals medium damage to all enemies (1 hit). Uses weapon's element. Applies Defenseless for 1 turn.

skills.Name: Fleuret Fury
skills.Description: Deals high single-target Physical damage (3 hits). If in Virtuose Stance, remain in that stance. Can Break.

skills.Name: Gommage
skills.Description: Kills weak targets. Otherwise, deals extreme Void damage (1 hit).

skills.Name: Guard Down
skills.Description: Changes stance to Offensive. Applies Defenseless to all enemies for 3 turns.

skills.Name: Guard Up
skills.Description: Applies Shell, reducing damage taken, to up to 3 allies for 3 turns.

skills.Name: Gustave's Homage
skills.Description: Deals high single-target Lightning damage (8 hits). Increased damage to Marked targets. Doesn't remove Mark.

skills.Name: Last Chance
skills.Description: Reduces self-Health to 1 but refills all AP. Switches to Virtuose Stance.

skills.Name: Mezzo Forte
skills.Description: Reapplies current stance and gives 2–4 AP.

skills.Name: Momentum Strike
skills.Description: Deals high single-target damage (1 hit). Uses weapon's element. Increased damage to Marked targets. In Virtuose Stance, costs 4 AP.

skills.Name: Offensive Switch
skills.Description: Deals low single-target damage (1 hit) and applies Defenseless for 3 turns. Uses weapon's element.

skills.Name: Payback
skills.Description: Deals very high single-target Physical damage (1 hit). Reduced AP cost for each attack parried since last turn. Can Break.

skills.Name: Percee
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Physical damage (1 hit). Increased damage to Marked targets. In Virtuose Stance, costs 2 AP.

skills.Name: Phantom Strike
skills.Description: Changes stance to Defensive. Deals very high Void damage to all enemies (4 hits). Also grants +35% of a Gradient Charge.

skills.Name: Phoenix Flame
skills.Description: Applies 10 Burn to all enemies and revives all allies with 50–70% Health.

skills.Name: Pyrolyse
skills.Description: Deals extreme single-target Fire damage (3 hits). Applies 5 Burn per hit. In Offensive Stance, applies 2 more Burn per hit.

skills.Name: Rain of Fire
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Fire damage (2 hits). Applies 3 Burn per hit. In Defensive Stance, applies 2 more Burn per hit.

skills.Name: Revenge
skills.Description: Deals high single-target Fire damage (1 hit). Damage increases for each hit received since the previous turn. Can Break.

skills.Name: Spark
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Fire damage (1 hit). Applies 3 Burn. In Offensive Stance, applies 2 more Burn per hit.

skills.Name: Stendhal
skills.Description: Changes stance to Stanceless. Deals extreme single-target Void damage (1 hit). Removes self-Shields and applies Defenseless to self.

skills.Name: Swift Stride
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Physical damage (1 hit). Switches to Virtuose Stance if target is Burning. Regains 0–2 AP.

skills.Name: Sword Ballet
skills.Description: Deals extreme single-target damage (5 hits). Uses weapon's element. Critical Hits deal double damage.

skills.Name: Virtuose Strike
skills.Description: Deals high single-target Physical damage (5 hits).

PassiveEffect.Level4: Steal Shields removed by hitting enemies.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Switch to Virtuose Stance on breaking any Shield.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Hitting a Marked enemy breaks all its Shields.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Double Gradient generation while in Defensive Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level10: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Defensive Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level20: +5% of a Gradient Charge on Parry.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Critical hits apply Burn.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Base Attack applies 2 Burn.
PassiveEffect.Level20: 100% Critical Chance while Stanceless.

PassiveEffect.Level4: On Defensive Stance, gain 1 Shield per Parry. Lose all Shields on turn start.
PassiveEffect.Level10: 20% increased Light damage with Skills.
PassiveEffect.Level20: 50% increased Counter damage per Shield.

PassiveEffect.Level4: On turn start, if Stanceless, switch to Offensive Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Fire Skills cost 1 less AP.
PassiveEffect.Level20: +1 Shield on switching to Offensive Stance.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Critical hits with Skills give 2 AP. Once per turn.
PassiveEffect.Level10: 20% increased Lightning damage with Skills.
PassiveEffect.Level20: +50% Critical Chance while in Offensive Stance.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Self-Heal by 2% Health on dealing a Critical hit.
PassiveEffect.Level10: +50% Critical Chance while in Defensive Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level20: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Defensive Stance.

PassiveEffect.Level4: In Defensive Stance, gaining AP also gives 1 AP to allies.
PassiveEffect.Level10: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Defensive Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level20: +1 AP on Stance switch.

PassiveEffect.Level4: In Offensive Stance, double the amount of Burn applied.
PassiveEffect.Level10: 50% increased Burn damage.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Base Attack propagates Burn.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Allies recover 20% Health on switching to Virtuose Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Gain Shell when switching out of Virtuose Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Cleanse self Status Effects when switching to Virtuose Stance.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Switch to Virtuose Stance on Counterattack.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Apply 5 Burn on Counterattack.
PassiveEffect.Level20: 50% increased Counter damage per Shield.

PassiveEffect.Level4: In Virtuose Stance, hitting a Marked enemy doesn't remove Mark.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Switch to Virtuose Stance on Counterattack.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Gain Shell when switching out of Virtuose Stance.

PassiveEffect.Level4: N/A
PassiveEffect.Level10: N/A
PassiveEffect.Level20: N/A

PassiveEffect.Level4: Start in Virtuose Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level10: In Virtuose Stance, every Burn applied is doubled.
PassiveEffect.Level20: In Virtuose Stance, Burn deals double damage.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Allies recover 20% Health on switching to Virtuose Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Applies Shell when Health is above 80%.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Switch to Virtuose Stance when Health falls below 50%.

PassiveEffect.Level4: On turn start, if Stanceless, switch to Defensive Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level10: In Defensive Stance, double Break damage.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Support Skills cost 1 less AP.

PassiveEffect.Level4: +1 Shield on switching to Offensive Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level10: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Offensive Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level20: +50% Critical Chance while in Offensive Stance.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Switch to Virtuose Stance on breaking any Shield.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Free Aim shots break 2 shields.
PassiveEffect.Level20: In Virtuose Stance, all damage pierce Shields.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Apply Burn on self on turn start. 10% increased damage for each self Burn stack.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Base Attack applies 2 Burn.
PassiveEffect.Level20: While in Defensive Stance, receive Heal instead of Burn damage.

PassiveEffect.Level4: In Defensive Stance, double Break damage.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Gain 9 AP on Breaking an enemy.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Breaking an enemy deals 3 high amount of Earth damage.

PassiveEffect.Level4: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Offensive Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Counterattacks apply Defenceless.
PassiveEffect.Level20: +50% Critical Chance while in Offensive Stance.

PassiveEffect.Level4: +1 AP on Stance switch.
PassiveEffect.Level10: If Stanceless, Base Attack switches to Defensive Stance.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Recover 5% Health on Stance switch.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Applying Shell also applies 1 Shield.
PassiveEffect.Level10: On applying Shields, also give 1 AP.
PassiveEffect.Level20: On switching to Virtuose Stance, double all Shields on allies.

skills.Name: All Set
skills.Description: Applies Shell, Powerful, and Rush to all allies.

skills.Name: Bad Omen
skills.Description: Deals low Dark damage to all enemies (2 hits). Applies 2 Foretell per hit.

skills.Name: Card Weaver
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Physical damage (1 hit). Propagates target's Foretell to all enemies and plays a second turn.

skills.Name: Dark Cleansing
skills.Description: Cleanses an ally of their Status Effects and propagates the target's buff to all allies.

skills.Name: Dark Wave
skills.Description: Deals high Dark damage to all enemies (3 hits). Consumes all Foretell to deal additional damage.

skills.Name: Delaying Slash
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target damage (2 hits). Uses weapon's element. Consumes Foretell to increase damage and delay the target's turn.

skills.Name: Doom
skills.Description: Deals very high single-target Dark damage (3 hits). Applies Powerless, Defenseless, and Slow for 3 turns. Can Break.

skills.Name: End Slice
skills.Description: Deals extreme single-target Physical damage (1 hit). Damage increases for each Foretell consumed since the start of battle.

skills.Name: Final Path
skills.Description: Deals extreme single-target Dark damage (1 hit) and applies 10 Foretell. Can Break.

skills.Name: Firing Shadow
skills.Description: Deals low Dark damage to all enemies (3 hits). Consumes 1 Foretell per hit for increased damage.

skills.Name: Focused Foretell
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Physical damage (1 hit). Applies 2 Foretell, or 5 if the target has none.

skills.Name: Fortune's Fury
skills.Description: Targeted ally deals double damage for 1 turn.

skills.Name: Grim Harvest
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Dark damage (1 hit) and heals all allies by 30% Health. Consumes Foretell to increase healing by 5% per Foretell.

skills.Name: Harvest
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target damage (1 hit). Uses weapon's element. Heals self by 40% Health. Consumes all Foretell to increase healing by 5% per Foretell.

skills.Name: Intervention
skills.Description: Targeted ally acts immediately and gains 4 AP.

skills.Name: Marking Card
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Dark damage (2 hits). Applies Mark and 3 Foretell to the target.

skills.Name: Our Sacrifice
skills.Description: Deals extreme Dark damage to all enemies (1 hit). Absorbs allies' Health and enemies' Foretell to increase damage.

skills.Name: Phantom Blade
skills.Description: Deals high single-target Dark damage (1 hit). Consumes all Foretell for additional damage. Can Break.

skills.Name: Plentiful Harvest
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Physical damage (2 hits). Consumes all Foretell on the target and gives 1 AP to a party member per Foretell consumed.

skills.Name: Rush
skills.Description: Applies Rush to 1–3 allies, increasing their speed for 3 turns.

skills.Name: Sealed Fate
skills.Description: Deals high single-target damage (5–7 hits). Uses weapon's element. Each hit can consume 1 Foretell to deal 200% more damage. Critical Hits don't consume Foretell but still gain the bonus.

skills.Name: Searing Bond
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Dark damage (1 hit). Applies 5 Foretell. Also damages and applies Foretell to every Burning enemy.

skills.Name: Shadow Bringer
skills.Description: Deals high single-target Dark damage to random enemies (10 hits). Applies 1 Foretell per hit.

skills.Name: Spectral Sweep
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target damage (2–6 hits). Uses weapon's element. Applies 1 Foretell per hit. Critical Hits apply an additional Foretell.

skills.Name: Twilight Dance
skills.Description: Deals extreme single-target Dark damage (4 hits). During Twilight, extends its duration by 1 turn. Consumes all Foretell to deal additional damage.

skills.Name: Twilight Slash
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Dark damage (1 hit). Consumes all Foretell to deal additional damage.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Free Aim shots can consume 1 Foretell to deal 100% more damage.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Base Attack applies 3 Foretell.
PassiveEffect.Level20: During Twilight, Free Aim shots deal double damage.

PassiveEffect.Level4: While having at least 1 active Moon charge, Moon Skills are always Critical but damage taken is doubled.
PassiveEffect.Level10: 25% increased damage per Moon charge.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Consuming Foretell applies 2 Burn on target per Sun Charge.
PassiveEffect.Level10: 100% increased Burn damage in Twilight state.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Sun Skills give one more charge.

PassiveEffect.Level4: 100% Critical Chance during Twilight.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Apply 1 Foretell on Critical hit.
PassiveEffect.Level20: 20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Sun Skills always apply 10 Foretell, but all damage taken is doubled.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge and consumes all Foretell to apply Burn.
PassiveEffect.Level20: 100% increased Burn damage in Twilight state.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Curse self on battle start. Deal 50% more damage while Cursed.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Reset Curse duration when entering Twilight state.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Play again when entering Twilight state.

PassiveEffect.Level4: +1 AP per Moon charge on turn start.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.
PassiveEffect.Level20: During Twilight, Base Attack consumes all AP. Base Attack applies 1 Foretell and deals 50% increased damage per AP consumed.

PassiveEffect.Level4: While having at least 1 active Sun charge, apply one Burn stack per hit taken.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Counterattacks apply 1 Burn per active Sun charge.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Base attack can consume 1 Sun charge to apply 5 Foretell.

PassiveEffect.Level4: During Twilight, every time Foretell is applied, it also affects another random enemy.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Apply 1 Burn every 3 Foretell applied with Skills.
PassiveEffect.Level20: 20% increased Fire damage with Skills.

PassiveEffect.Level4: On Twilight Start, apply Mark to all enemies.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Hitting a Marked enemy during Twilight doesn't remove Mark.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Apply 3 Foretell on applying Mark.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Free Aim shots can consume a Sun charge to apply 5 Foretell and consume a Moon charge to deal 400% more damage.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Consuming a Sun or Moon charge gives 1 AP.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.

PassiveEffect.Level4: During Moon, all allies have Greater Rush. During Sun, all enemies have Greater Slow.
PassiveEffect.Level10: During Twilight, all allies have Greater Rush and all enemies have Greater Slow.
PassiveEffect.Level20: +3 AP on applying a Buff or Debuff. Once per turn.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Killing an enemy with Foretell applies its Foretell to another random enemy.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Apply Mark on consuming Foretell.
PassiveEffect.Level20: 20% increased Dark damage with Skills.

PassiveEffect.Level4: On Twilight Start, deal damage to all enemies based on the amount of charges.
PassiveEffect.Level10: On Twilight Start, apply 2 Foretell per charge to all enemies.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Double Sun and Moon charge generation.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Sun skills have increased damage for each Foretell on the target. Moon Skills don't generate Moon charges anymore.
PassiveEffect.Level10: With at least 1 active Sun charge, gain one additional AP per Foretell consumed.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Base attack can consume 1 Sun charge to apply 5 Foretell.

PassiveEffect.Level4: During Twilight, all damage dealt is converted to Dark damage.
PassiveEffect.Level10: 20% increased Dark damage with Skills.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Apply Shell during Moon, Powerful during Sun, and Rush during Twilight.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Can consume 1 Moon charge on turn start to recover 20% of each ally's Health.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Moon Skills give one more charge.

PassiveEffect.Level4: Recover 5% Health per Foretell applied.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Healing Skills cost 1 less AP.
PassiveEffect.Level20: 30% increased Heal efficiency per Moon charge. Base Attack gives 1 Moon charge.

PassiveEffect.Level4: On turn start, gain 1 Shield if at least 1 Sun charge is active.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Apply 5 Foretell on enemies that break Shields.
PassiveEffect.Level20: +2 Sun charges on Counterattack.

PassiveEffect.Level4: N/A
PassiveEffect.Level10: N/A
PassiveEffect.Level20: N/A

PassiveEffect.Level4: Extend Twilight by one turn on using a Moon Skill. +50% Twilight damage increase on using a Sun Skill.
PassiveEffect.Level10: Twilight duration is increased by 1.
PassiveEffect.Level20: Play again when entering Twilight state.

skills.Name: Crippling Tsunami
skills.Description: Deals medium Ice damage to all enemies (1 hit). Applies Slow for 3 turns. Consumes Earth, Lightning, and Fire Stains for greatly increased damage.

skills.Name: Crustal Crush
skills.Description: Deals high single-target Earth and Break damage (5 hits). Consumes Lightning Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Earth Rising
skills.Description: Deals low Earth damage to all enemies (1 hit). Consumes Lightning Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Electrify
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Lightning damage (3 hits). Critical Hits trigger an additional hit. Consumes Fire Stain to generate one Light Stain.

skills.Name: Elemental Genesis
skills.Description: Deals extreme damage to all enemies (8 hits). Each hit deals damage in a random element. Can only be cast with Lightning, Earth, Fire, and Ice Stains.

skills.Name: Elemental Trick
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Ice, Fire, Lightning, and Earth damage (4 hits). Critical Hits generate the corresponding Stain.

skills.Name: Fire Rage
skills.Description: Deals increasingly high Fire damage to all enemies every turn until Lune receives damage. Stuns self if interrupted. Consumes Ice Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Healing Light
skills.Description: Heals the targeted ally and dispels Status Effects. Consumes Earth Stain: costs 0 AP.

skills.Name: Hell
skills.Description: Deals very high Fire damage that applies 5 Burn per hit to all enemies (2 hits). Deals self-damage if failed. Consumes Ice, Earth, and Lightning Stains for greatly increased damage.

skills.Name: Ice Lance
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Ice damage that Slows the target (1 hit). Consumes Earth Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Immolation
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Fire damage and applies 3 Burn (1 hit). Applies 2 more Burns if the target is Marked. Consumes Ice Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Lightning Dance
skills.Description: Deals very high single-target Lightning damage (6 hits). Critical Hits trigger an additional hit. Consumes Earth, Ice, and Fire Stains for greatly increased damage.

skills.Name: Mayhem
skills.Description: Consumes all Stains to deal high elemental damage to the target. Can Break if 4 Stains are consumed.

skills.Name: Rebirth
skills.Description: Revives an ally with 30–70% Health and 2 additional AP. Consumes Lightning Stains: costs 0 AP.

skills.Name: Revitalization
skills.Description: Heals 1–3 allies by 40–60% Health. Consumes Fire Stains to also apply Regen that heals on turn start for 3 turns.

skills.Name: Rockslide
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Earth damage (2 hits). Can Break. Consumes Lightning, Ice, and Fire Stains for greatly increased damage.

skills.Name: Sky Break
skills.Description: Deals extreme damage to all enemies (1 hit). Element depends on which Stains Lune has the most. Can Break.

skills.Name: Storm Caller
skills.Description: All enemies receive medium Lightning damage at the end of their turn and low Lightning damage when they receive damage. Duration: 3 turns. Consumes Fire Stains for double thunder strikes on turn end.

skills.Name: Terraquake
skills.Description: Deals low Earth and Break damage to all enemies every turn. Also increases Break damage received by 50%. Duration: 3 turns. Consumes Lightning Stains to increase duration to 5 turns.

skills.Name: Thermal Transfer
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Ice damage (2 hits). Gains 4 AP if the target is Burning. Consumes Earth Stains to play a second turn.

skills.Name: Thunderfall
skills.Description: Deals medium Lightning damage to random enemies (2–6 hits). Critical Hits trigger an additional hit. Consumes Fire Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Tree of Life
skills.Description: Cleanses all Status Effects and Heals all allies.

skills.Name: Tremor
skills.Description: Deals high Earth damage to all enemies (1 hit). Removes all enemies' Shields.

skills.Name: Typhoon
skills.Description: On turn start, deals high Ice damage to all enemies and Heals allies. Consumes Earth Stains to increase duration from 3 to 5 turns.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: 50% increased damage on Rank D. No damage increase on other ranks.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: On Rank D, recover 20% Health with Base Attack.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Perfection is now based on current Health. Gain 1 Rank every 20% missing Health.
Start battle at Rank S, but can't be Healed or gain Shields.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: 20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Light damage can Burn on Critical hits.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Increase Burn damage by 50% per Rank, up to 300% on Rank S.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Switch to Rank S on Break. Base Attack can Break.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Triggers a lightning strike on Critical hits.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Base Attack applies 2 Burn stack per Rank.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Increase Burn damage by 50% per Rank, up to 300% on Rank S.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Don't lose Rank when taking damage from Powerless enemies.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: +1 Perfection on hitting a Powerless enemy.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: No Perfection loss on damage taken. Perfection is instead lost on being Healed.
Base attack gives 1 Perfection per Burn on target.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: While Powerful, 20% chance to Burn on hit.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Start battle on Rank B, but 50% Health.
Casting a Light Skill increases damage of next Physical Skill cast by 50% and vice versa.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Dealing Light damage with a Skill recovers 3% Health.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Gain 1 Rank on Counterattack
Play again after a Base Attack.
When hit, lose 1 Perfection instead of 1 rank.
Convert Light damage Skills to Physical damage.
+1 Perfection on Critical hit.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: Self-Heal by 2% Health on dealing a Critical hit.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Counterattack is always a Critical hit.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Rank can't be lower than C.
Base Attack consumes all Shields to deal 100% increased damage per Shield.
N/A
Double Perfection gained on Free Aim shots.
Can't lose Perfection. No damage increase from Rank.
-1 to all Perfection gain but can't reach Rank S.
An ethereal Sword deals Light damage on any damage dealt with Skills.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: 20% chance to apply Burn on dealing Light damage.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Can't die if at least Rank A.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Bonus damage from Perfection applies to all allies at half value. Bonus damage no longer applies to Verso.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: Perfection gained is increased by 1 while Powerful

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: Gain 1 Rank on applying Mark.
PassiveEffects.Lvl10: Mark an enemy on Base Attack.
PassiveEffects.Lvl20: Apply Powerless on Marking an enemy.

PassiveEffects.Lvl4: N/A

skills.Name: Abbest Wind
skills.Description: Deals low single target Physical damage. 1 hit. Plays a second turn.

skills.Name: Aero Slash
skills.Description: Deals moderate Wind damage to a single enemy. 1 hit.

skills.Name: Healing Breeze
skills.Description: Restores a small amount of HP to one ally.

weapons.Name: Ballaro
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Reverse Bestial Wheel Order.
Lvl. 10: Using an Upgraded Skill gives 1 AP to all other allies.
Lvl. 20: Almighty Mask gives 2 AP to all allies.

weapons.Name: Boucharo
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Start battle in Agile Mask.
Lvl. 10: Agile Mask applies Rush for 3 turns.
Lvl. 20: +50% Critical Chance while in Agile Mask.

weapons.Name: Brumaro
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Replay instantly when in Almighty Mask.
Lvl. 10: +3 AP when in Almighty Mask.
Lvl. 20: Revive instantly with full Health if dead while in Almighty Mask. Once per Battle.

weapons.Name: Chromaro
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Start battle in Caster Mask.
Lvl. 10: Caster Mask applies Regen for 3 turns.
Lvl. 20: Skills cost 1 less AP while in Caster Mask.

weapons.Name: Fragaro
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Free Aim shots spin the Bestial Wheel to a random value.
Lvl. 10: Free Aim shots deal 100% more damage with all Masks except Almighty.
Lvl. 20: 100% Critical Chance while in Almighty Mask.

weapons.Name: Grandaro
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Start battle in Heavy Mask.
Lvl. 10: Heavy Mask applies Shell for 3 turns.
Lvl. 20: +1 AP per hit taken.

weapons.Name: Joyaro
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Start battle in Almighty Mask.
Lvl. 10: 20% increased damage for each consecutive turn without taking damage. Can stack up to 5 times.
Lvl. 20: Break damage is doubled while in Almighty Mask.

weapons.Name: Monocaro
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Start battle in Balanced Mask.
Lvl. 10: Balanced Mask applies Powerful for 3 turns.
Lvl. 20: Critical hits deal 30% more damage while in Balanced Mask.

weapons.Name: Nusaro
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Parries increase the Bestial Wheel by 1. Taking damage resets the Bestial Wheel.
Lvl. 10: Upgraded Skills deal 30% more damage.
Lvl. 20: +1 AP on Mask change.

weapons.Name: Sidaro
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: 30% increased damage per Upgraded Skill used. Resets upon using a non-Upgraded Skill.
Lvl. 10: Base Attack spins the Bestial Wheel to a random value.
Lvl. 20: Using an Upgraded Skill gives 1 AP to all other allies.

weapons.Name: Urnaro
PassiveEffect: Lvl. 4: Switch to Almighty Mask on Breaking an enemy.
Lvl. 10: Almighty Mask gives 2 AP to all Allies.
Lvl. 20: 50% increased Break damage.
